title: End-game Animation To big for my screen
body: I have been noticing this for quite some time I haven't been bothered by it an finally decided to check it out, but my end game animation for "Victory" or "Defeat" extends above my screen and is enlarged, any tips for fixing this problem?

replies.body: Errrmm....can't say I've heard of this problem before.  Are you using any unusual or heavily modified settings?  Such as editing them directly in the installation yourself?  Or did nothing change on your end and one day it just looked way larger than before?
I don't recall changing any settings, I think i actually had this problem for about year or so it just started to bother me now.
